properties.description: This initiative includes audit and virtual machine extension policies that address a subset of CMMC L3 requirements. Additional policies will be added in upcoming releases.

metadata.displayName: [Preview]: Include Arc connected servers for Guest Configuration policies
metadata.description: Optionally choose to audit settings inside Arc connected servers using Guest Configuration policies. By selecting this option, you agree to be charged monthly per Arc connected machine.

metadata.displayName: [Preview]: List of users excluded from Windows VM Administrators group
metadata.description: A semicolon-separated list of users that should be excluded in the Administrators local group; Ex: Administrator; myUser1; myUser2

metadata.displayName: [Preview]: List of users that must be included in Windows VM Administrators group
metadata.description: A semicolon-separated list of users that should be included in the Administrators local group; Ex: Administrator; myUser1; myUser2

metadata.displayName: [Preview]: List of regions where Network Watcher should be enabled
metadata.description: Audit if Network Watcher is not enabled for region(s).

metadata.displayName: [Preview]: Log Analytics workspace ID for VM agent reporting
metadata.description: ID (GUID) of the Log Analytics workspace where VMs agents should report.
Latest supported PHP version for App Services

metadata.displayName: [Preview]: Optional: List of Windows VM images that support Log Analytics agent to add to audit scope
metadata.description: A semicolon-separated list of images; Ex: /subscriptions/<subscriptionId>/resourceGroups/YourResourceGroup/providers/Microsoft.Compute/images/ContosoStdImage

metadata.displayName: [Preview]: Optional: List of Linux VM images that support Log Analytics agent to add to audit scope
metadata.description: A semicolon-separated list of images; Ex: /subscriptions/<subscriptionId>/resourceGroups/YourResourceGroup/providers/Microsoft.Compute/images/ContosoStdImage
Latest supported Java version for App Services
Latest supported Python version for App Services
Latest supported Python version for App Services

metadata.displayName: [Preview]: List of resource types that should have diagnostic logs enabled
metadata.description: Audit diagnostic setting for selected resource types

metadata.displayName: [Preview]: Minimum TLS version for Windows web servers
metadata.description: The minimum TLS protocol version that should be enabled on Windows web servers.

policyDefinitionGroups.name: CMMC_L3_AC.1.001
policyDefinitionGroups.description: Limit information system access to authorized users, processes acting on behalf of authorized users or devices (including other information systems).
